com.yahoo.gondola.core

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.gondola.core.Message

  • public class Message
extends Object
    Represents a Raft message in byte array form. Behaves like a struct on a byte array. A message is reference counted. When the reference count reaches 0, the message is automatically returned to the pool.

    Usage: Message message = pool.checkout(); message.handle(messageHandler); message.release();

        public int numCommands()
        Returns the number of commands in the messsage. A heartbeat contains no commands.
        Returns:

      • acquire

        public void acquire()
        Increment the reference count. It should be incremented before adding to a queue.

      • release

        public void release()
        Decrement the reference count. When the reference count reaches 0, it is returned to the pool.

      • handle

        public void handle(MessageHandler handler)
            throws Exception
        Delivers this message to the handler. The caller is responsible for releasing this message after calling this method.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • read

        public int read(InputStream in,
                int offset,
                Message overflow)
         throws Exception
        Returns the number of bytes read into the overflow message. If overflow is null, 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        overflow - a possibly-null message
        Returns:
        -1 if the input stream returns -1
        Throws:
        Exception
